item.title: Karnataka: Guest Teacher Beats Class 3 Student With Wire at Raichur Government School
item.description:
<![CDATA[A guest teacher at a government school in Raichur, Karnataka, allegedly beat a Class 3 student with a wire for not reading a lesson properly, leaving the child seriously injured and hospitalised, triggering protests by parents.
